projects.title: DevProfile
projects.summary: DevProfile is a personal portfolio website developed using Angular 16 and Tailwind CSS. It serves as a professional showcase, allowing visitors to explore projects, skills, and experience. Data like project details and skills are dynamically sourced from a JSON file hosted on GitHub, making it easy to update the content.Includes a 'Contact Me' form that sends emails directly to my inbox.

projects.title: CarFlex: Seamless Vehicle Rental Experience
projects.summary: CarFlex is a car rental system designed to allow users to search for cars, book cars, and rent cars. It includes account creation, car listings, booking management, and admin verification for rental approvals. The system ensures secure login and role-based access control.

projects.title: Criminal Activity Detection System
projects.summary: A system that detects criminal activity in real-time using deep learning algorithms. It utilizes CNN for activity detection and YOLO v7 for weapon detection, providing live camera monitoring and video upload features. The system sends alert notifications via SMS when suspicious activity or weapons are detected.
